item.title: Synthesis
item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
Guidance on using synthesis for my catalystic meditations and intentional visions of my innerspace and calling up or out narratives and narration. Explanations of each intention technique to help me unlock my full potential with/by progmatic mechanism. Whether I’m looking to inject some new intentions into my pathogenicus, narrative, currency, or meanwhile-ness, or simply want […]

item.title: There
item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
Pathogenicus serves as my structure that binds all my intentions and offers my essential context in which I interpret narrative synthesis. Incorporating significant performance influences facilitates infusion of my overarching narrative with a particular style and enhances coherence of my narrative. The period between historical narratives provides a generalized representation of my world that surrounds […]

item.title: Here
item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
Narrative synthesis involves generating melded associations and expanding or contracting upon such to establish pathogenicus clusters of potential narratives and character weavings- my mechanism or technique for character narration networking. I can employ synthesis at an pathogenicus [intersection] of my narrative or even later on, and it is particularly useful when I may struggle with […]
